Posts.Content: Morning all,sleep hey,onc supplied me with a mild dose of zopiclone 3.5mg the last 2 nights,took them at 11.30pm went to bed at 12 and haave got up at 9.30 tis morn,amazing,even slept through the hot sweats bliss,no se at all.had 2nd tax tue and ive even injected myself this time.Happy New Yr to all of you ladies xx
Posts.Title: 4 am club !!!

Posts.Content: Hi Mo ive seen mine once before surgery 7 months ago,she said im here if you need me,never needed her , had all the help i needed on here, so thx ladies xBevx
Posts.Title: BCN

Posts.Content: Hi Jan1 i was prescribed tramadol but didnt take any had my docetaxol reduced to 75% and took co codamol, worked ok just mild pain, hot bathes helped me and a hot water bottle. 20 days past my las tax and feeling ok just achey muscles,keep ontop of pain relief every 4 hrs and ibuprofen inbetween,hope thks help tax is vile hugs to you xBevx
Posts.Title: Aches and pains with Docetaxel

Posts.Content: Happy birthday Ali, a few scoops later no doubt xx
Posts.Title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Posts.Content: I think its given half hr before fec thx ladies x
Posts.Title: Have i made the wrong decision

Posts.Content: Thx dreamthief, read your link, pheww i imagined having double doses and being on my back for a month,thx
Posts.Title: Have i made the wrong decision

Posts.Content: Being caught up on this fast merry-go-round saw onc and agreed to have a 4mth plan of fec-t,he explained it was aggressive,on reading the paperwork i didnt realise that i would be havin dexrazoxane.Having read lots of info and help from you grt ladies i thought fec-t would be hard but do-able,now im really scared having read nothing about dex.any info and experience would be grt,is it to late to change my mind,thanks ladies x
Posts.Title: Have i made the wrong decision

Posts.Content: Morning dreamthief,i havent got any heart problems,got a good heart actually,but i am a smoker maybe thats why.still abit puzzled though and worried, dont really want the added SE when i dont know how to manage them,hopefully someone will come forward before thurs,thx to all you super ladies for making my journey more knowledgeable x
Posts.Title: Have i made the wrong decision

Posts.Content: Sorry soniraeb,meant 6 treatments in total over 4 month period x
Posts.Title: Have i made the wrong decision

Posts.Content: Hey shirls i was in same position as you, grade 3 i was given a choice of chemo. But due to percentages think mine was 20% in favour after chemo so decided to go ahead,it isnt as bad as i thought so far just had my 2nd round,good luck shirls x
Posts.Title: treatment

Posts.Content: Hi Elena, i had my 1st fec last thursday, i had amend anti sickness and havent felt nausea at all,im the oposite of you and have ate like a pig (oink)so far slept well but having fuzzy head a few times a day and constipation.probly because of empying contents of fridge and cupboard lol,ring your nurse they are grt and will help you for round 2.Eat little and often if you can and lots to drink, take care x
Posts.Title: 1st lot of FEC

Posts.Content: Well done all you ladies for reaching the end of chemo,something to celebrate xbevx
Posts.Title: Thursday/Friday chemo kitties

Posts.Content: Eating very well at the moment,having a chinese later,just feel very weird after steroids, and havent been sick either..yet. x
Posts.Title: 1st Fec

Posts.Content: Well..Took me a whole hr to be able to get the vile stuff in me,blubbering away and shaking,my beautiful husband and mom blubbering too,Took the bull by the horns sent them all out and did it,2 trys later bleeding under my skin,but its done,had 3 lots of antisickness (phobia) felt ok last night except fast then slow heart beat,waking up wet through but cold temp ok,today feel abit drunk for about 1/2hr,is it ok to take all meds together in the morning,got 2 anti sickness dex antibotic,hope this OK feeling lasts,got a a melon medley to munch now..nom nom x
Posts.Title: 1st Fec

Posts.Content: Thx pennyred,not feeling to bad,think it might be the steroid (dex)that s causing the problem,ok after 1//2 hr,havent had nausea at all,just abit headachy really,waiting for the storm, hope you are doing ok and yes be kind to yourself too x
Posts.Title: 1st Fec

Posts.Content: Thx muchly G n' J, definitely a celebration  in order cant wait. I think 2 of these instead of zoplicone would do the trick xx Bev
Posts.Title: Steroids

Posts.Content: Hi all ive been suffering pain from a broken tooth for 3 days,now its really thumping up to my eye socket,can i have a tooth pulled? On day12 after chemo,cant stand the pain worse than docataxol lol xbevx
Posts.Title: bad tooth

Posts.Content: Hi,my legs were achy and felt sore for about 3 weeks after chemo, started tamoxifen straight after so the joint pain has never really gone, hate the pain in my fingers and toes. Im on my 5th radiotherapy and is just like sun burn at the moment 15 to go lol,not half as bad as i expected, went back to work too and dont mind saying im shattered at the moment changing my tamoxifen brand tomorrow so see how i go, you will begin to feel better give yourself time for your body to heal,its been through alot, hugs xBevx
Posts.Title: legs aching

Posts.Content: Hi leen, my grade 3 lump was behind my nipple,i was devastated at the thought of having no nipple,but mastectomy was on the cards,had sentinal node and 1 more node removed through my breast,so no extra scar underarm which im thankfull for. Havent had many problems with breast a little swelling and uncomfortable for about 5 days post surgery. 7 months down the line i dont really mind having no nipple ive got used to it now and im opting for nipple tattoo rather tthan surgery,ive gotta have surgery on good breast to make them same size..  done chemo and having ct scan today and marker ready for radiotherapy. If you want to see a nipple tatooo friend Mistymoley ((hope she dont mind) on here a massive wealth on reconstruction and advice and also G n'J,. Good luck onn your journey and if you need to chat or scream everyone is here for you xBevx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed invasive ductal carcinoma.

Posts.Content: Steroids boooo, creme egg and a mint aero mmmmmmm, last chemo tomorrow, (oink oink)lol
Posts.Title: Steroids

Posts.Content: Thx peepee, the tooth has completely broken level with the gum line and face feels like its an abscess, agony isnt the word xbevx
Posts.Title: bad tooth

Posts.Content: Thx both i will ring unit in the morning,hope they d have dental unit, roof of mouth sore tonight aswell,roll on xbev
Posts.Title: bad tooth

Posts.Content: Ive never had the flu flu before just common colds,omg came on day 6 of my 5th chemo,double whammy,ive still got a bad cough 3 weeks later really doing my head in,gp said that its viral so didnt get meds,saw onco yesterday hes delayed my last chemo for a week so next friday will be my last yippeeee:-)I feel abit better,least im not wetting myself 5 times aday,bloody cough
Posts.Title: This new flu

Posts.Content: Brilliant news valerie,hope u have a stress free xmas x
Posts.Title: Yeeeaaaah - Yippeee Christmas Came Early!

Posts.Content: I was very much like you, never went for 5 days and was in so much pain, i took 10mg of lactulose and 2 senna before bed,i could hear and feel my stomach all night, i finally went and so much relief, i took another 5mg and everything seemed to settle, then the dreaded diarrhea hope this helps xbev
Posts.Title: Endgame!!

Posts.Content: I was very much like you, never went for 5 days and was in so much pain, i took 10mg of lactulose and 2 senna before bed,i could hear and feel my stomach all night, i finally went and so much relief, i took another 5mg and everything seemed to settle, then the dreaded diarrhea hope this helps xbev
Posts.Title: Endgame!!

Posts.Content: Aww lovely littlesusie x
Posts.Title: Just had a nice surprise

Posts.Content: HI Sam your emotions will be all over the place right now and nothing any1 says will make you feel any better, when you get your treatment plan things tend to settle in your mind. I had lumpectomy and 2 lymph nodes removed, my breast surgery was really painless and lymph nodes feel bruised and sore, its hard to lift your arm to start but with excersie things get easier over the first week, I only took paracetamol and that seemed to work, I had 6 rounds of chemo and  20 radiotherapy, every1s treatment is different . I nearly 9 months out of chemo now and back at work full time, I have the down days still when I feel abit tired but that's down to tamoxifen which I hate with a passion I hope everything goes well for you and your lymph nodes will be clear, the ladies on here are invaluable keep chatting to every1 theirs always somebody to help with any worry you have. Good luck hun xx Bev
Posts.Title: New to here

Posts.Content: I feel you Spenfold,fantastic news,good for you,lumpectomy a doddle,just uncomfortable lymph nodes,and get plenty of rest the first week,fatigue kicks in AGAIN,well done hun,finish the bottle, yayy Bev xx
Posts.Title: In a bubble

Posts.Content: Thx will give it a go x
Posts.Title: Do i need antibiotics

Posts.Content: Will they still give me chemo tomorrow with infection,really not looking forward to this,beside myslf with worry,feel poorly before i have started,nausea headache shakes stomach cramps,oh my days x
Posts.Title: Do i need antibiotics

Posts.Content: Hello all, think i might have oral thrush,had antibiotics for a infection in breast and finished the course a week sunday gone,my tongue looks abit white,sore and ive got a horrid taste and feel sick,im due to meet onco nurses tomorrow and start chemo thursday what should i do Never had thrush before so i dont really know,sure my kideys are playing up too. X
Posts.Title: Do i need antibiotics

Posts.Content: Hey sarah im like you 5/6 chem done,nearly 4 weeks ago and still got the aching muscles,im finding it painfull to get up and down and still no taste,last 1 friday and dreading it.i can finally see the finishing line,just rads and reconstruction to go.keep well x
Posts.Title: Rotting away

Posts.Content: Hi comper22 i had that bloated feeling through tax,quite uncomfortable really,diarrhoea normally kicled in about day 8 after tax but wasnt to bad.my se differed each time, i preferred tax rather than fec hated it,2 months post chemo and feeling ok,good luck with the rest of your treatment xbevx
Posts.Title: Tax !

Posts.Content: Hi all im due a booster at 4.30 got to do it myself or hubby, when does the bone pain kick in and should i take co codomol prior to injection,also im due a steroid will this be ok,also how many seconds should i take to inject before it clicks thx x
Posts.Title: filgrastin booster

Posts.Content: Omdays i cant physically do it,making feel sick x
Posts.Title: filgrastin booster

Posts.Content: Done lol,the lady nurse did it for me,i still nearly vomited and held my breath for far 2 long lol thx ladies ive booked her for next month too,hope my levels dont bottom out this timee x
Posts.Title: filgrastin booster

Posts.Content: Fantastic Sarah,tamoxifen is yakky at first but 4 mnths on the SE dont seem to bad, im taking Adcal for bones and has helped tremendously,good luck 4 the future hun xbevx
Posts.Title: Said my goodbyes

Posts.Content: Hi jives68 had my 2nd fec yesterday,not doing to bad at all,night sweats horrendous had them last time think its the steroids,lucky i found out today the lady opposite me is a mac nurse,asked her hubby to send her over when she gets home at 6.30,hope she agrees.Been sitting here for 2 hrs cant do it,what a wimp ay x
Posts.Title: filgrastin booster

Posts.Content: Hiya its lovely to hear when treatment is coming to an end,gives us all hope that our chemo will finally be over too,havent lost my hairline yet after 3 fec,3 more to go and hope to be happy and where you are now,keep smiling lovely x
Posts.Title: Strange things make me happy

Posts.Content: I absolutly love that :-)might get a smaller version though (wimp)lol x
Posts.Title: Tattoos

Posts.Content: Well done to u too,dont know how i should feel,tramadol ready,,yes i kicked ass thx for that x Bev x
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Im ok so far just dry mouth,done all my chores Hoover mopping etc,having lunch now steriods the gotta try injecting myself lol,will let u know afta kati,i held it in my hand 2 hr last time had about 5 needle pricks....felt so embarrast kati all my famalam was round and kept booooing at me.not 1 would it for me,we all wimps lol,how u coping ? XBev
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Hi jacqueline yes a hopefull normal life,gonna try making the most while i can,how u doin ? Bev x
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Keep trying girl,i will eat anything at the mo,son cooking me a spag bol yummy,also christmas pud and cream,,got 3 left lol,happy eating girls x
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Ive done my last chemo ladies, struggled over that finishing line battered and bruised but made it 1 piece...i think lol. My emotions are all over the place, feel like crying laughing but im to tired to do  either lol, getting ready for my last train to run over me and then listen to D-ream..things can only get better x
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Kati you have gotto keep your spirit..humour and self belief,its the things that have helped me through this confusing and down right awful journey,trying to make a few laughs along the way,and a good rant too,and of course meeting all the lovely ladies who continue to comfort and guide us all on our journey long after their treatment has finished. Your Amazing x Bev
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Hi susie,  ive been using a dye frrom holland and barret,finished chemo january and dyed my hair in may,ttheirs no amonia or anything harmful in these colours and £10.99 so not bad considering,and my hair looks and feels good xBev
Posts.Title: When can I colour my hair after chemo and do I need to use a vegetable...

Posts.Content: Definately mistymoley,a few nice meals and voddy for starters,fifty shades of grey!! A good kick start :-)at cinema hehehe,and a few days away a must then rads,thats February sorted,y birthday 5th march another few voddys and maybe a Baileys, fancy Brighton in may, a few things sorted,its nice to make plans.must go the fridge really needs me lol x Bev x
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Nice little family on here Avi1766,you can ask all the questions u need to,even daft stuff, some1 will always give good advice,im not that good with the technical stuff but lv to chatand help if i can,and always keeping my humour,talking of which the fridge is calling me again lool,u will get ttheir  love xBev
Posts.Title: yahooo

Posts.Content: Hi, yes I'm still very tender. 1 yr tomorrow since my op, had lumpectomy and 2 nodes removed, since rads I've become more tender and sore in places where no scar tissue or anything, I was worried for quiet a while having finished rads in April but my 1st yrly mammo came back clear last week, and I'm still poking and prodding, think I might e causing some of the tenderness myself , best wishes. Bev xx
Posts.Title: Tender still after a year .

Posts.Content: Grt stuff flower24 ive got a log burner but havent got round to fitting yet x
Posts.Title: Getting Rid of Frustrations!

Posts.Content: Hi Avi think the 5th chemo is the worst, when you hit the brick wall,my last wasnt the worst but you know its the last so everyday gets better xx
Posts.Title: Is The Third Tax The Worst?

Posts.Content: Happy New Year to the whole group,past and present.I raise my glass to you all,keep smiling :-) xx
Posts.Title: HNY

Posts.Content: Hi all, i havent had a problem getting them yet had 2 mnth supply,didnt like teva brand joints in toes and fingers were really painfull,  im down to achey joints now but its early days, hope they dont change them . Be
Posts.Title: Wockhardt brand 20mg Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi i finished rads 6 wks ago, used aqueous cream morning and night didnt have that much soreness just like mild sunburn and rough feeling skin. I continued for 4 weeks after and just alittle brown in my armpit now no effects at all now,good luck to you xbevx
Posts.Title: What is the best cream to use before I start radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi all, hope every1 is well, just a little update, had my lipo filling done the 21st  and boy am I black and blue, never seen bruising like it before, it took about 5 days for the pain in my legs to ease and so I could sit down properly, not only did he take fat from thigh but butt cheek and hip, surgeon said said I should ov ate more chocolate over Xmas lol, no breast pain at all just badly bruised, gotta go back the 12th, think I'm gonna be having uplift on good breast, my new 1 is perfectly round now but scar still a little indented so we see what round 2 brings, bring it on lol xx bevxx
Posts.Title: Re Lipo filling

Posts.Content: Hi girls,im the same 6 mnths after chemo, apparently when your hair falls out due to chemo ylur brain thinks your a hair folicles are of a new born baby,well all my kids were born hairy so im not disagreeing with it but i havent a better explanation,and im definitely not shaving it lol. Bev
Posts.Title: I'm growing a hairy,furry face!!!

Posts.Content: Lol 1 stone 3 pound ive Put on,theyve given me iinjections throughout my chemo,ive sat their with the needle in my hand for 2 hrs at a time,still couldnt,hubby no way i said to him after seeing his big grin,so ive imposed on neighbors drs everywhere rather than do it myself.my mom rang me the last time to invite me for t, well within 5 min i did it myself lol(hungry belly or what ) lol ,hope you enjoyed ur peace and quiet spenfold,i hated chemo 5, 6th and final 1 week today x
Posts.Title: Omg injecting myself arghhh !!!

Posts.Content: Lol carol i would have wet myself laughing but like you say by the time they've finished all our dignity has long gone ,, but i  bet they've seen worse sights lol,you made me chuckle thanks for that xBevx
Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Hi all, had my markers today and ct scan,they were painless really,though it was gonna hurt but all good.Thought the markers were all together where rads was gonna blast me,but no only for machine alignment,how thick am i lol,they gave me the new type gown with velcro on the shoulders to take home and to use for each treatment,better than the tie 1s which show your bum lol.So 3 tattoos for life grt and they look like little freckles,lymphodema check the 4th and rads the 10th,nearly done xBevx

Posts.Content: Lol got cream chilling in fridge,hope i dont get them mixed up, aqueous and strawberries eww, cowbelle dairy cream on boob!!!! XBev

Posts.Title: Markers

Posts.Content: Fantastic news hun,im waiting for my results too,its been 14 days now getting abit nervous xbevx
Posts.Title: Result of first mammogram today ...

Posts.Content: Hi all im having 5th round tomorrow 2nd docataxel,i feel i havent got over the last 1 yet,although i didnt find it to bad ive still not got much taste and feel tired all the time and knee joints hurt, is this normal or just accumulated effects,getting over a head cold too,dreading tomorrow and a sleepless and sweaty night due to steroids,might hang my head out the window and also join the 4am club (much love ladies)xx
Posts.Title: 5th chemo

Posts.Content: Ali get a sleeping bag lol much easier lol xBevx
Posts.Title: I need 4 arms !!!

Posts.Content: Thx Alison for the good advice,would defo prefer mornings,,have to wait and see ay,my onco is Dr Answar lol def a man lol,knowing my luck i'll be in last and miss my t, so i will be in the refreshment shop lol, thx again x Bev
Posts.Title: last chemo friday

Posts.Content: Chemo cancelled for tomorrow due to coughing up mucus,i feel ok though,another week to go now-fed up,just want it done
Posts.Title: last chemo friday

Posts.Content: Ive read with interest your comments about stress/alcohol lifestyle maybe contrubuting to bc,being very active for yrs and never ill.in 2001 became a publican for 10 ys obviously overindulging and grabbing meals when i could because of long hrs.i finally gave up and moved into health care,still very long hrs and stressfull.In the last 2 yrs ive done 2 diplomas and 3 nvqs.3 colleague's i work with hav been diagnosed with cancer,1 lung and has passed on age 59 me bc another melanoma and neck lymph age 24 we are all sharing the stress levels.Have found out that im up for promotion in march,more stress,could do with learning some relaxation techniques when i return xx
Posts.Title: To have the op or try alternative

Posts.Content: Im 3 weekly little susie,i found it much better than fec beleive it or not,se seem to last about 4 days and co-codamol worked well for me.and where has my extra stone in weight come from,in denial about binge eating lol,hubby reckons im never without something in my mouth lol x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo

Posts.Content: Thx noodles,having 75% of T,he mentioned i must have 300ml of T which is another 3 to go,dont really want the extra 1as i need to get back to work,how much T did you have xx
Posts.Title: 5th chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Jeanette, my hair started falling out gradually on day 21,i had it cut short and lost most after fec 3,by my 2nd tax it was growing back and 4 weeks later its about 1cm long but black and pure white.weird lol..got 1 tax left now and hair growing back everywhereLooking quite  fuzzy on my head hope it settles,least we all know its temporary ,i hate my wig although it looks good and keeps slipping now hair is growing,think it will be a good couple of months b4 i can brush it and cant wait,im very impatient lol,hugs to you x
Posts.Title: Hair Care before and after Chemo

Posts.Content: Yes liz not looking forward to the travelling,20 mile round trip so not to bad,feel sory for my dad whose taking me,any1 had rads at New Cross Wolves just wandered what the parking charges are or do you get a pass,just thinking ahead lol x
Posts.Title: last chemo friday

Posts.Content: Although im dreading it cant wait if you know what i mean,chemo has been dreadful for me because im such a wimp,cant beleive how sad and miserable ive felt.The 5th chemo being the worst and my legs and arms still ache.Im hoping my last will be less eventful..LOL. gotto start the dreaded tamoxifen and wait for appointment for rads,Hair is now coming on a treat although its white with black streaks,finally lost my eyebrows and eyelashes....look so weird now without them,lady garden also growing back booo Just like to thank every1 whos helped me along the way and the ladies starting your journey,its not nice but you will come through it,no doubt i'll be winging next week lol,best wishes to all. X  Bev
Posts.Title: last chemo friday

Posts.Content: Hi alison yes dr A oh hes lovely,signed me off now till june,i live in south staffs cannock area,i will take my own dressing gown thx for the tip alison x Bev
Posts.Title: last chemo friday

Posts.Content: Thx hun definitely try the oatmeal sounds lush x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo..vile

Posts.Content: Thx donna,peak is an understatement,definitely dont want anymore of this x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo..vile

Posts.Content: Horrendous this time,bloody Tax,cant seem to get head off the sofa,cant walk..think straight..skin hurting to touch and my mouth well just vile,Aaargggggg rant over,sorry ladies x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo..vile

Posts.Content: Hi,got the usual difflam,nyastin,co-codamol,its not so much the pain bonbon its the greasy mouth and really bad fatigue thats doing me in x
Posts.Title: 5th chemo..vile

Posts.Content: Hiya ladies,just thought id tell ou my taste buds are finally returning to normal 4 weeks post chemo, its amazing what food you forget,least i can taste my vodka tonight lol take care xBevx
Posts.Title: Horrible Taste in Mouth

Posts.Content: Good luck today Stoatie,take some deep breaths,the nurses will look after you,get some boiled sweets for grotty mouth, hugs xBevx
Posts.Title: Starting FEC T today

Posts.Content: Merry Christmas everyone xx
Posts.Title: Xmas

Posts.Content: Hi ladies ive been on tamoxifen for 6 mnths now, and like you future my energy at the moment is very lack,ive put it down to work though building myself up slowly since april but now full time and bloody tired. The beginning of the week i seem fine then as the week goes on i get worse, but i do alot of shifts days evenings nights etc,my other problem is abit of ocd so im getting frustrated with not coping like i did before,my hip and feet suffer the most my oncologists said i only need tamoxifen for 2 yrs so 18 mnths left hey, im taking adcal which definitely help with the joint pain. Take care all Bev x
Posts.Title: Side effects from Tamoxifen after nearly a year

Posts.Content: Hi ladies ive been on tamoxifen for 6 mnths now, and like you future my energy at the moment is very lack,ive put it down to work though building myself up slowly since april but now full time and bloody tired. The beginning of the week i seem fine then as the week goes on i get worse, but i do alot of shifts days evenings nights etc,my other problem is abit of ocd so im getting frustrated with not coping like i did before,my hip and feet suffer the most my oncologists said i only need tamoxifen for 2 yrs so 18 mnths left hey, im taking adcal which definitely help with the joint pain. Take care all Bev x
Posts.Title: Side effects from Tamoxifen after nearly a year

Posts.Content: Finally found the courage to ring bc nurse about mammo results, im a definate Neddy, omg i cant stop shaking, only took me 5 weeks to find out lol, what a long yr  but im out the other side. Best wishes all. Bev xx
Posts.Title: its official

Posts.Content: Good luck 2 you both,hope its gonna be kind to you xbevx
Posts.Title: Thursday/ Friday chemo club

Posts.Content: Hi yvonne,i think its down to having low immune system,ive never had the flu until now,got the worst cough ever.being cold lowers immunity too,my dr said its viral but hasnt give me anything for it,so cough sweets is all im taking.your not being soft,i think everything seems worse after bc,i panic about everything now, hugs to you
Posts.Title: Head cold from hell

Posts.Content: Lol both id love to,my  brain still the same but my body is under massive protest, just feel like ive gotta keep pushing myself to the limit,realised today that my body isnt the same at the moment but i get such grt pleasure out of it.the voddy has helped me unwind and im going out tomorrow night without my wig and stilettos..hope my toes hold  out lol xBev
Posts.Title: Returned to work

Posts.Content: Morning all, ive been on tamoxifen  for 6 months now i take mine around 9 pm which is always when i seem to get a hot flush. I get afew hot rushes now again without the sweating and achy joints which i take adcal for no nausea now which wore off after the 1st month so not to bad really, i too take wokhardt, your first month will be the worst getting in your system. All the best. Bevxx
Posts.Title: Taking Tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Hi ladies,ive been feeling good the last week or 2  so decided to do a bigger shift..11 hrs,although ive rested  during my shift my bloody joints in my toes and fingers are murder,ive been taking tamoxifen for 3 weks so dont know if its meds causing this problem,just chilling tonight after doing nothing today,well i hoovered neighbours house because she is getting over a brain tumour, ive got o c d so i revelled at the thought of cleaning a different house lol, im now shattered so having a vodka and cuddles of hubby...nice xBevx
Posts.Title: Returned to work

Posts.Content: Brilliant news xxso pleased for you x
Posts.Title: survivor

Posts.Content: Hi rebecca i was in your situation in august,panic stricken and mind all over the place.went for surgery the 3rd of august not knowing much because nothing would sink in,had my lumpectomy and woke groggy due to the anaethetic,not much pain in the breast area but sore where my lymph nodes were taken,surgeon came and said it went well and the c was gone.what a relief,recovery was about 2 weeks just uncomfortable in bed and tiredness,pls dont worry you will be fine,i know its easier said than done,im nearly finished my chemo now and think surgery was the easy part,i lost my nipple but im going to have recon after rt,read through your literature when you feel stronger,get plenty of rest when you can put your feet up and let family or friends do you a nice xmas dinner,good luck rebecca (((hugs))
Posts.Title: The unknown

Posts.Content: Hello yep same as me fit 48 yr, after lumpectomy 20 rads and tamoxifen since Feb I can safely say I'm like a 90 yr old in the morning, I've changed my brand to mylan and I don't feel any different, tamoxifen is definitely ruining my days, hope it gets better in time xx bevxx
Posts.Title: Quality of life 7 weeks in??

Posts.Content: Yes ali owl its normal,mine hurt too,when i changed nailvarnish 2 weeks ago nails were black half way down, they seem to be growing out now,my nails look vile like the ridges in the sand when the tide goes out,hope they dont drop off..probably will,toe nails ok so far xbevx
Posts.Title: weird question? ??

Posts.Content: Getting ahead of myself i know but havent talked to any1 yet about when radiotherapy and recnstruction will be offered,is it normally pretty quick for rads and slow for recon? And advice needed for surgery,nipple recon and smaller boob made bigger or breast reduction to better boob,i am or was a 36d bust lol,thx hugs x
Posts.Title: time between chemo rads and reconstruction

Posts.Content: I woke up at 7am this morning and had sickness and diarrhea, i havent been sick for over 30yrs,Didnt know what end to deal with 1st, havent been to bad for my last chemo but today..GOSH, day 6 so expected really, feel like poo,son cooking dinner,hope i can keep abit down..starving marvin xBev
Posts.Title: Throwing up

Posts.Content: Kati how you coping?i feel totally different now ive eaten lol,pains nearly gone, a well earned vodka tomorrow i think, treat yourself y not :-) xBev
Posts.Title: Throwing up

Posts.Content: G n' J i do hope so,managed abit lf dinner, just been thinking i took 2 co-codamol and a sleeping pill b4 bed and my tummy was quite full,might b that, you always manage to cheer me up lol xBev
Posts.Title: Throwing up

Posts.Content: I had lumpectomy back in august kati,nearing  the end of treatment now just rads and as G n' J says TamoxiFUN xBev
Posts.Title: Throwing up

Posts.Content: Hi 2daughters i had lumpectomy 3 mnths ago and 2 lymph nodes removed,still some days i have pain where lymph was remove think its the nerves knitting together and feels hard too,early days hugs x
Posts.Title: Boob pain after lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Lol ladies give me it all im starvin,managed some crackers today with cheese n chives, got a fry up for tea with chips (im not greedy really errhum) been about ct scan and marker today,gotta have rads for 4 weeks, dinner time yayyyy. XBev
Posts.Title: Throwing up

Posts.Content: HEY 58petals welcome to the group, all your worries are perfectly normal and we all went through this process early on because its hard to take everything in, you don't mention chemo so I presume you've escaped this being being stage 1 and caught early, if they thought of spread then I would say they would give you chemo aswell to clear up. I was caught at an early stage 1 but I had aggressive grade 3 and had too have chemo and rads, I finished all my treatment in Jan and rads April,the ladies on here are truly inspirational and dreamthief off course any worries will be addressed by someone throughout your journey, I had the all clear last month and I truly can't beleive it but its good to be in the neddy club ( no evidence of disease) and you too will be joining sooner than you think, best wishes hun. Xbevx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed yesterday...

Posts.Content: Hi,i agree with mistymoley we instantly think the worst,i did this and the stress can be totally overwhelming and make us feel more ill,looking back i panicked,wished i hadnt but you need to relax your in safe hands.i had a wle and lost my nipple,daunting at first but having a new one after chemo and rads,iit was my decision to have chemo i was to scared not to,2 left now and although it can be hard going i just look at my boys and know ive given it my best shot,good luck whatever your decision is its gotto be the right one for you. (((Much love))
Posts.Title: Just joined the roller coaster - help !

Posts.Content: Hi they automatically take u in the anu unit as a precautionary measure to be on the safe side,most ladies dont have infections at all,then they give u the injections to boost ur immune system so you can fight it yourselfThe will probably give you injection to take home to inject yourself,i was admitted for 4 days after 1st fec but havent bottomed out since,u will b fine a week later dont worry hun x
